mapper.insert: insert into delegation(dele_no, tmp_no, duty_no, dele_date) values(delegation_seq.nextval,#{tmpNo},#{cNo},sysdate)
mapper.select:
select t2.* from (select rownum as rn, t1.* from (select del.tmp_no, del.duty_no, del.dele_date, c.c_name, tmp.tmp_name ,del.dele_no from delegation del, template tmp, code c where del.tmp_no=tmp.tmp_no and del.duty_no=c.c_no
and tmp.tmp_name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
and c.c_name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
order by del.dele_date desc ) t1 )t2 where rn>=#{startRow} and rn<=#{endRow}

select count(*) from(select t2.* from (select rownum as rn, t1.* from (select del.tmp_no, del.duty_no, del.dele_date, c.c_name, tmp.tmp_name from delegation del, template tmp, code c where del.tmp_no=tmp.tmp_no and del.duty_no=c.c_no
and tmp.tmp_name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
and c.c_name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
) t1 )t2)
